entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 19.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 1:00 PM MST Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 19.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 22 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 7 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
